description:
ARE YOU READY TO REALIZE DIRECT CONNECTION WITH YOUR CREATOR AS YOUR MOST SUCCESSFUL PARTNER IN LIFE?

Embark on an extraordinary adventure of soul initiation that catapults you into a great expansion of consciousness and the experience of oneness.

You are supported with:

12 weeks of powerful soul initiations

12 Mp3 Audio Activations (guided meditations)

12 Video Introductions

12 Pdf Teaching Modules

Daily Integration Tools

The Rites of Passage is a highly transforming adventure of 12 back-to-back initiations guiding you into expanded states of conscious perception.

You will learn how to know and intimately live your divinity as a being of loveâ€™s magnificence and to lift your life from the experience of limitation.


Accelerate Your Conscious Evolution...

  • Actualize your Self as Divine Presence.
  • Open the door into multi-dimensional perception and a completely different life matrix.
  • Transition into liberated consciousness and a brand new creative expression.
  • Transcend duality and see beyond the physical form.
  • Penetrate the reality that lies behind thought, beyond the rationalizing mind.
  • Live your life according to the flows of love, intuition and synchronicity.
  • Become an instrument of service for Divine Will and humanity's evolution
  • Manifest instantly through thought and feeling alone.
  • Make permanent transition into a life of higher purpose


Live the life of divinity and realize the self as a vibrant and powerful channel of love divine.


The Rites of Passage program is designed to benefit everyone, no matter the level of conscious awareness. This course is designed for students of life who have a strong desire to know the self! You are ready to give a 12 week commitment to RADICALLY SHIFT your life!

ACTIVATE YOUR MAGNIFICENCE and transform your personality and entire life!

ACTIVATE YOUR MAGNIFICENCE and release yourself from hard work and struggle!

ACTIVATE YOUR MAGNIFICENCE and leave behind the fears, conflict and pain!
title: Rites of Passage Spiritual Empowerment
